column4: hey quick questions guys I added the ppa for banshee on hardy
but the version is old (1.4) when 1.5 is already out
What version was available in the PPA?
Do you have a link to the ppa that you can share?
I don't knwo if it has to do anything because I'm using hardy instead of karmic
https://edge.launchpad.net/~banshee-team/+archive/ppa
okay, one moment
I see 1.5.4 for karmkic, but the one for hardy is still at 1.4.3
Then theres nothing you can do.
that's BS, lol
I rolled back to LTS for a more stable system.  Not so I can suffer new features of few selected programs that I use on a day to day basis
More stable means that you will not be running the latest and greatest software.
If you contact the Banshee Team, there is a chance that they could provide a build of the newer version for Hardy.
i could try to build one myself, sounds like fun
you still around?
Yes
cool, gona e-mail the dude that makes the builds and ask him if there is any way to make an updated one for ubuntu hardy.
you wouldn't happen to know a fix around why my ipod isn't detectable in banshee do you?  I tried the "killall -9 nautilus" fix that I use in karmic but it just freezes my whole computer on Hardy
I've never actually used Banshee, sorry.
damn that sucks
o well time to keep googling then
